meta.name: Montessori Home Curriculum
meta.description: Curated essential Montessori activities for home learning environment

works.name: Carrying a Tray
works.description: Carrying a tray with objects balanced and stable

levels.name: Empty Tray
levels.description: Carry empty tray with proper grip

levels.name: Tray with Fragile Objects
levels.description: Carry tray with glass or breakable items

works.home_tip: Start with a wooden tray and lightweight objects like pompoms or soft balls. Keep it light and fun!

works.name: Walking on the Line
works.description: Walking carefully on a line marked on the floor
works.home_tip: Use painter's tape to create a spiral or circle on the floor. Start with basic walking, gradually add challenges.

works.name: The Silence Game
works.description: Group activity to practice being completely still and silent

levels.name: Extended Silence
levels.description: Longer periods, listen for subtle sounds

works.home_tip: Start with 1-2 minutes. Use a special bell or chime to signal beginning and end. Great for self-regulation!

works.name: Pouring Dry Materials
works.home_tip: Start with pasta, move to rice, then sand. Use child-sized pitchers. Set on a tray to contain spills.

works.name: Pouring Water
works.home_tip: Use lightweight metal or plastic pitchers. Keep a sponge nearby for spills. This builds real independence!

works.name: Spooning
works.home_tip: Use wooden spoons and bowls. Start with large items, progress to rice. Excellent fine motor preparation!

works.name: Tonging
works.home_tip: Start with salad tongs and cotton balls. Very engaging and builds hand strength for writing!

works.name: Large Buttons Frame
works.home_tip: Can purchase or DIY with fabric and large buttons. Critical for dressing independence!

works.name: Zipper Frame
works.home_tip: DIY friendly! Mount zipper on fabric board. Essential for jacket independence!

works.name: Bow Tying Frame
works.home_tip: Easy DIY - fabric with ribbon sewn on. Great for shoe-tying prep!

works.name: Hand Washing
works.home_tip: Set up a child-height wash station. Use a step stool. Essential daily life skill!

works.name: Dressing Oneself
works.home_tip: Use the flip jacket method. Store clothes in accessible, labeled drawers. Patience is key!

works.name: Sweeping
works.home_tip: Child-sized broom and dustpan are essential. Kids love helping! Builds responsibility beautifully.

works.name: Plant Care
works.home_tip: Start with hardy plants like succulents. Low-maintenance but teaches care and responsibility.

works.name: Flower Arranging
works.home_tip: Use real flowers from yard or market. Safety scissors for cutting. Beautiful practical activity!

works.name: Table Manners
works.home_tip: Model behavior consistently. Make mealtimes peaceful and structured. Grace and courtesy happen naturally!

works.name: Setting the Table
works.home_tip: Create a placemat template with outlines. Child places items in correct spots. Great sequencing practice!

works.name: Cutting Soft Foods
works.home_tip: Child-safe knives with round tips essential. Start with very soft foods. Real food prep is wonderful!

works.name: Making a Snack
works.home_tip: Simple snacks: crackers & cheese, apple slices, fruit plate. Real independence and life skill!

works.name: Cylinder Block 1
works.description: Cylinders varying in diameter only (same height)
works.controlOfError: Cylinders don't fit or one left over
works.home_tip: Core Montessori material. Builds fine motor and visual discrimination skills essential for writing.

works.name: Pink Tower
works.description: Ten pink wooden cubes graduating from 1cm¬≥ to 10cm¬≥
directAims: Visual discrimination of size in three dimensions
works.home_tip: Iconic Montessori material. Develops spatial awareness, visual discrimination, and concentration.

works.name: Brown Stair (Broad Stair)
works.description: Ten brown wooden prisms with constant length but varying width/height from 1cm to 10cm
works.home_tip: Works beautifully alongside Pink Tower. Can combine for extensions. Develops spatial awareness.

works.name: Red Rods (Long Rods)
works.description: Ten red wooden rods varying in length from 10cm to 1 meter
works.controlOfError: Rods don't align at one end, stair uneven

levels.name: Building Stair
levels.description: Arrange longest to shortest aligned at one end

works.home_tip: Direct preparation for Number Rods. Excellent gross motor and visual discrimination work.

works.name: Color Box 1 (Primary Colors)
works.description: Three pairs of color tablets - red, yellow, blue
works.home_tip: Start here before Box 2. Great for vocabulary and visual matching. Very affordable DIY option.

works.name: Color Box 2 (Secondary Colors)
works.description: Eleven pairs of color tablets including primary, secondary, and other colors
works.home_tip: Progression from Color Box 1. Introduces orange, green, purple, pink, brown, black, white, gray.

works.name: Geometric Cabinet
works.description: Cabinet with six drawers containing 35 geometric shape insets
works.home_tip: Beautiful material for geometry vocabulary and shape discrimination. Quality investment!

works.name: Touch Boards
works.home_tip: Excellent DIY project! Use sandpaper and wood. Develops finger sensitivity for writing.

works.name: Binomial Cube
works.description: Puzzle representing the cube of a binomial (a+b)¬≥
works.controlOfError: Pieces don't fit in box, pattern doesn't match lid
works.home_tip: Beautiful puzzle! Introduces algebra concepts through play. Wonderful for older 3-6 children.

works.name: Mystery Bag
works.description: Bag containing objects to identify by touch
works.home_tip: Super easy DIY! Use any drawstring bag and household objects. Develops tactile discrimination beautifully.

works.name: Number Rods
works.description: Ten red and blue rods representing quantities 1-10
works.home_tip: Foundation of Montessori math. Can DIY with dowels and paint. Teaches quantity visually!

works.name: Sandpaper Numerals
works.home_tip: Easy DIY with sandpaper and cardboard! Teaches numeral formation through touch. Critical for math readiness!

works.name: Spindle Boxes
works.description: Box with compartments 0-9 for counting spindles
works.controlOfError: Wrong number of spindles left over

levels.name: Counting Spindles
levels.description: Place correct quantity in each compartment

works.home_tip: Excellent one-to-one correspondence work. Can DIY with box and dowels. Teaches zero beautifully!

works.name: Cards and Counters

levels.name: Placing Counters
levels.description: Place counters in pairs under cards

works.home_tip: Perfect for understanding quantity-symbol relationship and discovering odd/even. DIY very easy!

works.name: Short Bead Stair

levels.name: Introduction
levels.description: Learn bead bar colors and values

works.home_tip: Beautiful material combining color and quantity. Prepares for addition and multiplication.

works.name: Introduction to Golden Beads
works.description: Introduction to units, tens, hundreds, thousands
materials: Golden Bead Material (units, ten-bars, hundred-squares, thousand-cubes)
works.home_tip: Cornerstone of Montessori math! Beautiful concrete representation of decimal system. Quality investment!

works.name: Large Numeral Cards
works.description: Cards for units (1-9), tens (10-90), hundreds (100-900), thousands (1000-9000)
materials: Large Numeral Cards (green units, blue tens, red hundreds, green thousands)
works.home_tip: Works with Golden Beads to show symbol-quantity relationship. Color-coded for place value.

works.name: Association of Quantity and Symbol
works.description: Connecting golden bead quantities with numeral cards

levels.name: Matching
videoSearchTerms: montessori golden beads quantity symbol association

works.home_tip: Bridge between concrete beads and abstract numerals. Critical for understanding number.

works.name: Exchange Game (Change Game)
works.home_tip: Concrete introduction to carrying/regrouping. Essential foundation for addition/subtraction!

works.name: Teen Board 1 (Seguin Board A)
works.home_tip: Essential for understanding teen numbers. Shows 10+unit structure concretely with beads.

works.name: Hundred Board
works.controlOfError: Tiles don't fit or sequence incorrect
works.home_tip: Excellent for number sequence and pattern discovery. Can DIY. Great independent work!

works.name: Addition Snake Game
works.description: Adding colored bead bars using the snake game
works.home_tip: Concrete addition with beads. Shows combining and regrouping naturally. Leads to addition facts!

works.name: Stamp Game
works.description: Colored stamps representing place value for all operations
materials: Stamp Game box with colored stamps
works.home_tip: Bridge between concrete (beads) and abstract (pencil/paper). Shows carrying beautifully!

works.name: Fraction Insets (Metal or Plastic)
directAims: Understanding fractions as parts of whole
works.home_tip: Concrete introduction to fractions. Shows parts of whole visually and tangibly.

works.name: Clock Work
works.home_tip: Teaches practical skill - telling time. Great for understanding daily schedule and routines.

works.name: Sound Games (I Spy)
works.description: Phonemic awareness activities isolating sounds in words
works.home_tip: FREE and essential! No materials needed. Play I Spy during meals, car rides, walks. Critical for reading!

works.name: Metal Insets
works.description: Geometric frames for developing pencil control and lightness of touch
works.home_tip: Critical for writing prep! Teaches pencil grip and control through art. Beautiful Montessori material!

works.name: Sandpaper Letters
works.description: Tactile letters for learning letter sounds and formation
works.controlOfError: Texture provides tactile feedback on correct path
works.home_tip: Easy DIY with sandpaper and cardboard! Combines letter sound with tactile formation. Critical for literacy!

works.name: Moveable Alphabet
works.description: Wooden or plastic letters for word building
materials: Large Moveable Alphabet (blue consonants, red vowels)
works.home_tip: Beautiful bridge between sounds and symbols. Child writes words phonetically BEFORE reading instruction!

works.name: Pink Series (CVC Words)
works.description: Complete reading series for 3-letter phonetic words
materials: Pink Series materials: picture cards, word cards, phrases, sentences, booklets

levels.name: Picture-Word Matching
videoSearchTerms: montessori pink series picture word matching

works.home_tip: Structured phonetic reading program. Can use free online versions or DIY with cards. Builds confident readers!

works.name: Blue Series (Blends)
works.description: Reading series for words with consonant blends
materials: Blue Series materials: picture cards, word cards, phrases, sentences, booklets

levels.name: Initial Blends
levels.description: Words starting with bl, cl, fl, etc.

levels.name: Final Blends
levels.description: Words ending with nd, mp, etc.

works.home_tip: Progression from Pink Series. Introduces blends (st, fl, br, etc.). Expands reading complexity naturally!

works.name: Green Series (Phonograms)
works.description: Reading series for words with phonograms
materials: Green Series materials organized by phonogram
works.home_tip: Introduces phonograms (th, ch, sh, oa, etc.). Teaches irregular phonetic patterns. For fluent readers!

works.name: Puzzle Words (Sight Words)
works.description: High-frequency words that don't follow phonetic rules

levels.name: First Set
levels.description: the, a, is, to, and, etc.

works.home_tip: Sight words for fluency. Start with most common (the, and, a). Critical for reading speed!

works.name: Introduction to the Noun
works.home_tip: First grammar concept. Simple: nouns are naming words. Use household objects. Can DIY easily!

works.name: Introduction to the Verb
works.home_tip: Second grammar concept. Verbs show action. Use movement and real verbs. Very engaging!

works.name: Classified Cards (Nomenclature Cards)
works.description: Picture cards organized by category for vocabulary building
materials: Classified card sets (animals, plants, vehicles, etc.)
works.home_tip: Build vocabulary through pictures. Can DIY with magazine cutouts. Great for language development!

works.name: Vocabulary Enrichment
works.description: Building vocabulary through conversation and objects
works.home_tip: Natural and daily! Talk about what you do. Name objects. Use precise language. Feeds all learning!

works.name: Globe - Land and Water
works.home_tip: Tactile introduction to Earth. Child discovers most of Earth is water through touch. Beautiful foundation!

works.name: Globe - Continents
works.home_tip: Color-coded continents. Progression from sandpaper globe. World geography begins here!

works.name: Puzzle Map - World
works.home_tip: Child builds world map! Teaches shapes and locations of continents. Wonderful geography foundation!

works.name: Land and Water Forms
works.home_tip: Three-dimensional landform models. Island, peninsula, cape, bay, etc. Vocabulary through modeling!

works.name: Living vs Non-Living
works.home_tip: First classification. Living things grow, move, eat. Non-living don't. Easy DIY with pictures!

works.name: Parts of a Plant
works.home_tip: Root, stem, leaf, flower. Start with real plant observations! Much more engaging than puzzles.

works.name: Plant Life Cycle
works.home_tip: Grow real seeds at home! Fascinatingly simple. Child witnesses seed->sprout->plant->flower->seed!

works.name: Five Classes of Vertebrates
works.home_tip: Classify animals by characteristics. Fish have gills, birds have feathers, mammals have fur. DIY with pictures!

works.name: Sink and Float
works.home_tip: Simple water experiment. Predict, test, observe. Teaches scientific thinking through play!

works.name: Magnetic/Non-Magnetic
works.home_tip: Explore what magnets attract. Great hands-on science! Teaches prediction and observation.
